record.title: MEASURES PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--H.J. RES. 20 AND S. 470

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, before I turn this over to the Republican leader, there are two bills at the desk for a second reading, is my understanding.

record.narrative: The clerk will report the measures by title for the second time.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I object to any further proceedings at this time with respect to these bills en bloc.

record.chair: Pursuant to rule XIV, the measures will be placed on the calendar.
